attributes.action: Enable older people, who are among the main users of health services, to have the choice of continuity of care with their family GP, rather than having to make do with continual change and disruption as private companies such as Virgin bid for contracts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
General practices are proposed to be taken over by companies such as Virgin who's loyalties are likely to be towards their shareholders, rather than their patients.
This further introduction of the marketplace in healthcare is likely to mean that your GP is only your GP as long as the business has a contract.
As a therapist working with older people I am acutely aware of the stresses experienced when individuals have to travel further for healthcare services, and have a change of GP. 
I am asking the Government to halt these disastrous plans, if "client choice" really is at the heart of your agenda.
